attributes.action: make microchips safer and rectify the problems to save our pets from harm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make the microchip companys research the chips and rectify what is damaging and harming our pets. the microchip has caused our pet to spend 7 weeks in a vets hospital and  have a 20cm hole in her neck due to a reaction which happens in some pets. we want the companys to find out what is causing this and rectify the chip to make it safer . they should also be made to let people know what might happen when a chip is fitted if any reaction to the chip appears or any problems afterwards, i/e the risks of having a chip fitted and the problemsit might cause to make owners aware before they have there pet chipped.
